content: this top is designed as a boxy over top which hangs slightly over the arms you can alter the neckline so it sits on your shoulders or wear it off one shoulder the top is a rectangle where there is a neck/ head opening created by casting off stitches and is sewn at the sides the design uses hand spun seaweed yarn in fingering/4 ply weight available from www veganyarn co uk but any fingering weight yarn can be used just as long as its not a sock yarn with elastic we use 6mm needles with fingering weight yarn to give a very open lace effect and a top that knits up very quickly
